recipes.label: The Forked Tongue
recipes.startdescription: They say the pen is mightier than the sword, and my tongue is pen of a million, million words. We will affront or attack or lead astray. We can approach this task with the dominance of Grail or the venom of Knock.

recipes.label: Lead Them to a Pitfall
recipes.startdescription: The trick is to make them act unwittingly selfless. It is better to please you than vex you, after all. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Lead Them Down the Wrong Path
recipes.startdescription: The trick is for them not to be aware that you are pointing them in the wrong direction. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Lead Them Astray
recipes.startdescription: The trick is for them not to notice when you plant the seeds for their demise. We may yet succeed.

recipes.label: Venomous Speech
recipes.startdescription: Our conversation is dripping with malefaction and bile. As if they were a shepherd's flock, they will fear our scorn and act as we desire. We will probably succeed.

recipes.label: Venomous Phrases
recipes.startdescription: Our conversation is coated with malevolence and bitterness. Our tone may etch stone, and it will shock and stagger those we speak to. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Venomous Words
recipes.startdescription: Our conversation is laced with malice and ill intention. They may not hear, and they may walk the path we set out. We may yet succeed.
